about_the_game:
Security Control is a 1-4 player Party-Horror Game. You have fallen asleep on your first day of work and now have to evade the security officer! Hide, run, complete objectives, steal money and escape before you get caught and fired!

In a unique twist you can take the role of the Security Guard and chase your friends around the workplace, make sure to catch them all!

TRAVERSE EVER-CHANGING WORKPLACES
Get ready to explore 10 different levels with 5 different workplaces, and 30 unique objectives. Including malls, offices, schools, a cruise ship and a haunted mansion. With randomly generated levels each play is uniquely different! The possibilities are endless!

GAMEPLAY

The Cellphone
Your essential in-game companion: the Cellphone. Packed with versatile apps, it's your go-to for navigating the corporate maze. Stay connected with your team, hack security cameras, or boost your visibility with night vision. Coordinate with coworkers and choose the right tool for the job to ensure success.



Complete Texts
While you are trying to escape your workplace your significant other is texting you to complete objectives before coming home, like beating the high score at the arcade! Make sure to complete all the objectives before you come back from work, or you shouldn't come back at all!



Play With Friends
Embark on your escape mission solo, with a squad of friends, or join an online lobby to outwit the vigilant security team. Utilize every resource available to make your way out of the corporate maze before you're caught. Can you and your team uncover the secrets of the office and make your grand escape, or will you assume the role of the relentless security guard to thwart their every move?



FREE YOUR FRIENDS
When you are caught it isnt over yet! Work with your friends to save yourself from jail and continue to complete the mission.

FEATURES

PC and VR Crossplay
Play on PC or VR.
Randomly Generated Workplaces
No two workplaces are the same, workplaces are randomly generated to ensure it always feels like your first day.
Play and complete games to unlock more characters, apps and customizations
